document: <sentence id="s1" text="Overall, our findings establish small GTPase mediated signal transduction as a tumor-suppressive mRNA splicing, via spliceosome in MM and provide a mechanistic rationale for combining trametinib with negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II inhibitors or bortezomib to treat patients with tumors exhibiting low RASSF4 expression.Significance: These findings provide a mechanistic rationale for combining trametinib with HDAC inhibitors or bortezomib in patients with multiple myeloma whose tumors exhibit low RASSF4 expression.">
